explains: n. 八度音阶；八行诗；十四行诗的前八行；八个一组的事物
adj. 八个一组的；高八度音的

sentences.en: He's singing an octave lower than the rest of us.
sentences.cn: 他唱的比我们其他人都低八度。

sentences.en: Running up to an acid semitonal acciaccatura in both hands, the piano goes over into a sprint of octave-chords and single notes.
sentences.cn: 钢琴的两只手以半音阶短倚音向上，转变成八度和弦和单音符。

sentences.en: It's got only six notes within the octave.
sentences.cn: 一个八度里只有六个音符。
